about_the_game:
Sweet Tavern - A simple and beautiful puzzle game based on the theme of a medieval tavern. Five tavern girls serve guests in different ways, with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery. (Update AI model)

- The game has three difficulties

- Press the "F" key to open the black and white picture when solving the puzzle

- Players can press the 'blank' key during the game to complete the puzzle.

- Players can press the AD key, left and right keys or left and right mouse buttons in the gallery to quickly view the girl's pictures

* Image size 800x960 px

highlighted.name: Welcome. What would you like to order today?
Welcome to come again next time
Come back soon, I'm waiting for you

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity or pornographic content

-Clear depiction of male/female reproductive organs
- Not suitable for viewing at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
